paragraphs: I graduated in Computer Programming and Management Information Systems.
I aim to become a Software Developer with a willingness to learn new technologies and strong analytical thinking skills.
I continuously improve myself in Java, Spring Boot, and ReactJS.
I strive to add value to the software industry as a team player with strong communication skills and a focus on continuous learning and development.

items.title: Ä°SKÄ° Dam Tracking Application (Full-Stack)
items.description: Using Ä°SKÄ°'s publicly available dam occupancy data, I developed a full stack project with the trio of Spring Boot (Backend) + Flutter (Mobile) + AWS (Deployment). Thanks to the application, it is possible to track the current occupancy rates of dams in Istanbul.
items.tech: Technologies: Java 17, Spring Boot, Maven, Flutter, Dart, AWS EC2, AWS RDS, CI/CD

items.title: Library Application (Full-Stack)
items.description: This project is a modern web application developed using Spring Boot (Backend) and React (Frontend), featuring a JWT-based authentication system. It provides a platform where users can register and log in, and perform CRUD operations on books in a shared library.
items.tech: Technologies: Java 17, Spring Boot, Maven, Hibernate, PostgreSQL, jjwt, ReactJS, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Axios, Bootstrap 5

items.title: Simple REST API with Java & Spring Boot
items.description: In this project, I developed a REST API using Java and Spring Boot to perform basic CRUD operations.
items.tech: Technologies: Java 17, Spring Boot, H2 Database, Maven

items.title: ðŸ“š Library Management System
items.description: A full-stack library management system with backend built in Java Spring Boot and frontend in ReactJS. Includes add, delete, update, search, and pagination features.
items.tech: Technologies: Java, Spring Boot, ReactJS, Tailwind, Axios

items.title: Portfolio Website
items.description: A single-page portfolio site developed with ReactJS and Tailwind CSS. Designed to showcase my frontend skills.
items.tech: Technologies: ReactJS, Vite, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript
